hero.subtitle: Multimedia Journalist
hero.description: 7 years covering crisis zones from the Middle East to Africa, telling stories of resilience and humanity.

sections.servicesIntro: I am available to work on content strategy and production coordination for social, humanitarian, political, and environmental stories around the world.
sections.servicesCard1Desc: Developing editorial approaches to shed light on people living in crisis zones. This includes editorial planning that balances impact with ethics, and risk assessment for field operations in conflict zones.
sections.servicesCard2Desc: Managing multimedia production projects from pre-production through delivery. I coordinate international teams of photographers, videographers, and journalists working across multiple countries, ensuring quality and consistency.
sections.servicesCard3Desc: Training journalists and humanitarian communicators for field work. Sessions cover ethical storytelling in vulnerable contexts, advanced multimedia techniques, and managing the psychological impact of crisis reporting.
sections.contactTagline: Available for assignments, collaborations and consulting projects
